mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Berthault, Pierre Gabriel, 1737-1831
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Flesselles, Jacques de, 1721-1789
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mort de M. de Flesselles prévôt des marchands de Paris
Death of Mr. de Flesselles, mayor of Paris
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A large mob of people, many armed with bayonets, spill out of the room where a man shoots another man (presumably M. de Flesselles)
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Broadus Bailey French Revolution Print Collection
